context: The document provides an overview of life at the University of Colorado Boulder, including information about the campus, resources, and opportunities available to students, faculty, staff, families, and alumni. The provided chunk discusses the resources available to the CU Boulder community to help them make the most of their time on campus.
chunk_text: Resources Students Faculty Staff Families Alumni Breadcrumb Home Campus Resources Life at CU Boulder Life at CU Boulder Life at CU Boulder Boulder is one of the top-ranked college towns in the U.S. for a reason. Make the most of your time at CU Boulder by exploring all that the campus and city have to offer.
